chapter.title: VM Pools
chapter.para:
The VM pool specific elements which may be contained in the VM pool description are as follows:
size The number of VMs in the pool
cluster A reference to the cluster which VMs in this pool run on
template A reference to the template which VMs in this pool are based on
For example:
chapter.screen: <vmpool id="0" href="vmpools/0"> <name>test</name> <description>Testing, Testing</description> <size>0</size> <cluster id="0" href="clusters/0"/> <template id="00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000" href="templates/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"/> <actions/> </vmpool>
chapter.para: When creating a new VM pool, the name, template id and cluster id properties are required. Only the name, description and size elements may be updated post-creation.
